## IGlAttribute.setSize() method

Resizes the buffer ready as a copy target. Clears the current data / dirty state.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setSize(context: WebGL2RenderingContext, byteSize: number, usage: GLenum, changeId: number): void;
```

void
